mapper.insert: insert into t_login_info (user_name, status, ipaddr, login_location, browser, os, msg, login_time) values (#{userName}, #{status}, #{ipaddr}, #{loginLocation}, #{browser}, #{os}, #{msg}, sysdate())
mapper.select:
select info_id, user_name, ipaddr, login_location, browser, os, status, msg, login_time from t_login_info
AND ipaddr like concat('%', #{ipaddr}, '%')
AND status = #{status}
AND user_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
and date_format(login_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(login_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y%m%d')
order by info_id desc
